title: The best art of Twitch to ever grace the rift

replies.body: I give up, never gonna top this.

Shoulda had this guy do the splash art update. 

Be careful or he'll take your job, JindleKack.
Not as good as Candlejim but I'll pay that.
At least it's not CandleJack, say his name and you'll dissa-

Jack be Kindle
Jack be Jin'
Jack jump over the Candlejim
top Kack

You should at least try imitating this art for all the champions in the game, and add this superior artstyle at least for a day, as to not overshadow your work. Let's say, just to throw a random date, next April 1.

I bereive!

U can do it!
What can I say? I have a gift. I don't mean to threaten your job security like this ;)
Feeney's been replaced lol
That's a nice Zac, the illuminati stick really brings out his mysterious side
